title: Bloques
description: Historial de bloques minados por Flexpool
average_luck_tooltip: Promedio de suerte de bloques en los últimos 30 días.
current_luck_tooltip: Suerte en el bloque, de la ronda actual. Este valor se actualiza en tiempo real.
network_hashrate: Tasa de Hash en la red
network_difficulty_tooltip: Media de cuántos hashes debe producir el pool para minar un bloque.

table.title_zero: No se han podido obtener los datos del pool
table.title: Flexpool ha minado {{count}} bloques
table.title_miner_zero: You haven't mined any blocks yet

orphan_tooltip: Orphan blocks are the blocks that were not included to the canonical chain. Typically, it happens because of the internal infrastructure problem on the Mining Pool, or due to the chain reorganizations, 51% attacks.
uncle_tooltip: Uncle blocks are blocks that have the same parent hash and number. They are caused because of the high latency between mining pools. Typically, they appear when two mining pools mine two blocks at the same time, both having the same block number.
